description: Floating dock replacement at Dauphin River, MB. The contract includes delivery of 6 - 1.219 X 6.096 finger float wharves and 3 - 1.829 X 6.096 principal float wharves. The existing wharves are to be removed, new wharves to be unloaded and installed by others. Project to be completed by March 31, 2023. Region: Manitoba. Department: Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
duration_in_months: After project commencement. Estimated completion date: January 2024.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Floating Dock Replacement – Dauphin River, MB

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01008704
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 30003508
**Publication Date:** September 29, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 14, 2022, 13:00:00

This is an Invitation to Qualify tender announcement by Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Small Craft Harbours, for the replacement of six (6) floating docks and three (3) principal float wharves at Dauphin River Harbour, Manitoba.

**Project Overview**

The contractor will be responsible for the supply and delivery of the following:

* Six (6) 1.219 X 6.096 finger float wharves
* Three (3) 1.829 X 6.096 principal float wharves

The removal of existing float wharves, unloading of new float wharves upon delivery, and installation of new float wharves will be completed by others.

**Scope of Work**

The contractor is required to:

1. Execute the works as per the requirements outlined in the Canada Labour Code Part II (2008) and Public Health Requirements.
2. Comply with all federal and provincial public health guidelines in place during the construction and contractor working on site.
3. Ensure timely completion of deliverables as listed in Section 4.0 of the tender package.

### Tender Details

* **Location**: Dauphin River, MB (onsite works) and Contractor’s place of business
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction and Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

To access the tender package, including the Request for Qualification (RFQ) and Addendum 1, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GC Bid) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/. 

Contact Information:
* Karine Plante, Fisheries and Oceans Canada: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, 506-377-9127
* Please note that the tender closing date and time cannot be extended. Only qualified contractors meeting the requirements and conditions as outlined in the tender package will be considered for this opportunity. We look forward to working
